Unusual volume of outbound data from int.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for outbound connections to known code repository domains/IPs. Calculate outbound vs. inbound byte ratios for these connections. Flag sessions or hosts with significantly asymmetric outbound data volume, especially exceeding baselines established using historical data or statistical methods like IQR on daily outbound data volume to code repos.

Network connections to code repository s.Action: Correlate network connections (Zeek conn.log) to code repository services with process creation events (Windows Event ID 4688) on source hosts. Identify connections originating from processes or users not typically associated with software development roles or code repository interaction based on established baselines. Use correlation analysis between process names/users and connection destinations/times.
